Dochula Druk Wangyel festival Tshechu, on 13th December 2017!
Druk Wangyal Festival at Dochula under the Thimphu district.

And book your tour destination 5 Night- 6 Days tour.
Overview tour Itinerary.

Day: 01- 11th December 2017.
Arrival at Paro International airport at Paro Bhutan.
and then transfer to Thimphu check in at Hotel, evening visit Tashichhodzong (fortress), overnight stay in Thimphu.

Day: 02- 12th December 2017.
Thimphu sightseeing after breakfast, visit National Memorial Chorten, big buddha dordenma statue point, Changgakha Lhakhang temple and Takin Zoo at Moutithang. And after lunch visit Nannury temple, Dechen Phodrang Monastery, overnight stay in Thimphu.

Day 03- 13th December 2017.
Thimphu-Punakha 
After breakfast transfer to Punakha on reaching Dochula and witness the festival whole day at Druk Wangyal Tshechu's after that aorund 3: 30 pm/ 4 Pm transfer to Punakha overnight stay in Punakha.

Day: 04- 14th December 2017
After breakfast transfer to Paro on reaching Paro visit National Museum, after lunch visit Paro Rempong Dzong and Drungtshe temple and kichu lhakhang temple,
Overnight stay in Paro.

Day: 05- 15th December 2017.
After breakfast hike to Taktsang Monastery (Tiger's Next) visit Tiger's Next temple, lunch at Taktsang Cafeteria and then back to Paro town if you deepening on your interested for shopping and enjoy the last day in Bhutan.............................!

Day: 06- 6th December 2017.
After breakfast transfer to till Airport for the next destination to Bangkok from Paro International airport.
